QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: Click to point, Click and drag
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ControlType
CameraSlideSpeed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Maximum gimbal speed on click and drag (deg/sec)

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showAzimuthIndicatorOnMap
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show gimbal Azimuth indicator over vehicle icon in map

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: toolbarIndicatorShowAzimuth
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show Azimuth instead of local yaw on top toolbar gimbal indicator

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: toolbarIndicatorShowAcquireReleaseControl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show Azimuth Acquire/release buttons in the gimbal buttons panel

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: When a joystick button is set to gimbal left/right/up/down, it will send this rate when pressed, and it will stop moving when button is released
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: joystickButtonsSpeed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Rate used for joystick button control (deg/sec)
